title: $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-courses
name: Courses
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course","description":"create a new course","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ \define get-text() $(textField)$ <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-course/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-course/Text}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text=<> background-color="#fff" caption="a course" color="red" icon="{{$:/core/images/video}}" image="$:/heiban.png" importance="" link="" linkcolor="" /> <$list filter="[enlist[Planning Ongoing Completed]!has[title]]"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<>/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory","description":"create a new category","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \define prefixText() <$text text={{{ [[< \define suffixText() <$text text={{{ [[">>]] }}}/> <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}} newcategoryCaption={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags!!tags}} newcategoryCtag={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag}} ctagStoreTiddler="$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag" storeTiddler="$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title/input" listopsTiddler="$:/courses-category-others" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> <$wikify name="newcategoryText" text={{{ [addprefixaddsuffix] }}}> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> caption=<> tags=<> ctag=<> text=<> list-before=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/ctagEmpty"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-course","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}} new course","description":"Create a new course","text":"\whitespace trim \define newcourseButton() <$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course}} tooltip="Create a new course" aria-label="new course" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new course"/> \end <> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}} new category","description":"Create a new category","text":"<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-coursecategory}} tooltip="Create a new category" aria-label="new category"> Create "},"COURSES":{"title":"COURSES","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/courses}} COURSES","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/courses","tmap.id":"351b7e22-b595-4a14-98da-3aacb204a64d","text":"\import $:/courses-macros
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-course}} tooltip="Create a new course" aria-label="new course" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new course  <> <>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/courses-aggregation-view $:/courses-category-view $:/courses-tidgraph-view" default="$:/courses-aggregation-view" state="$:/state/tab/course" />"},"$:/courses-category-agriculture-forestry-and-gardening":{"title":"$:/courses-category-agriculture-forestry-and-gardening","caption":"农林园艺","ctag":"Agriculture, forestry and gardening","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-art-and-design":{"title":"$:/courses-category-art-and-design","caption":"艺术设计","ctag":"Art and design","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-completed":{"title":"$:/courses-category-completed","caption":"已完成","ctag":"Completed","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-curriculum-or-pedagogy":{"title":"$:/courses-category-curriculum-or-pedagogy","caption":"教育教学","ctag":"Curriculum or pedagogy","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-economics":{"title":"$:/courses-category-economics","caption":"经济学","ctag":"Economics","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-engineering":{"title":"$:/courses-category-engineering","caption":"工学","ctag":"Engineering","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-history":{"title":"$:/courses-category-history","caption":"历史","ctag":"History","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-it":{"title":"$:/courses-category-it","caption":"计算机","ctag":"IT","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-languages-and-cultures":{"title":"$:/courses-category-languages-and-cultures","caption":"外语","ctag":"Languages and cultures","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-law":{"title":"$:/courses-category-law","caption":"法学","ctag":"Law","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-literature-and-culture":{"title":"$:/courses-category-literature-and-culture","caption":"文学文化","ctag":"Literature and culture","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-management":{"title":"$:/courses-category-management","caption":"管理学","ctag":"Management","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-medicine-and-health-care":{"title":"$:/courses-category-medicine-and-health-care","caption":"医药卫生","ctag":"Medicine and health care","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-ongoing":{"title":"$:/courses-category-ongoing","caption":"学习中","ctag":"Ongoing","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-others":{"title":"$:/courses-category-others","caption":"其他","ctag":"Others","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-philosophy":{"title":"$:/courses-category-philosophy","caption":"哲学","ctag":"Philosophy","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-planning":{"title":"$:/courses-category-planning","caption":"计划中","ctag":"Planning","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-category-science":{"title":"$:/courses-category-science","caption":"理学","ctag":"Science","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"<>"},"$:/courses-managetabs":{"title":"$:/courses-managetabs","caption":"{{$:/core/images/options-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"\import $:/courses-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]remove[$:/courses-newcategory $:/courses-managetabs]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]'> \end ! 默认分类 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 管理分类 Select which tabs will be shown. Drag and drop to change the ordering
''Caption'' -- //Ctag// <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter="!has[draft.of]remove[$:/listing-courses-all $:/courses-newcategory $:/courses-managetabs]" itemTemplate="$:/templates/aggregation-categories-item" />
"},"$:/courses-newcategory":{"title":"$:/courses-newcategory","caption":"{{$:/core/images/new-button}}","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Title \define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption \define ctagStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag \define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-coursecategory/Title/input \define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-coursecategory}} \define deleteButton() \whitespace trim <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] []" /> \end \define promptText() <$vars newcategoryTitle={{$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title}}> <$list filter="[get[text]match]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}} \end ! 新建分类 |<$link to=<>>Title |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> <> | |<$link to=<>>Caption |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |<$link to=<>>Ctag |<$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" tag="input"/> | |>| <> | <> {{$:/language/xp/aggregation/NewCategoryTips}}"},"$:/listing-courses-all":{"title":"$:/listing-courses-all","caption":"全部","tags":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","text":"\import $:/courses-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-list-thumbnails" width="220" height="123" storeTitle="$:/temp/search/courses/thumbnails" searchClass="xp-search-courses" promptTiddler="$:/courses-prompt" /> "},"$:/tags/CourseCategories":{"title":"$:/tags/CourseCategories","list":"$:/listing-courses-all $:/courses-category-planning $:/courses-category-ongoing $:/courses-category-completed $:/courses-category-it $:/courses-category-languages-and-cultures $:/courses-category-management $:/courses-category-philosophy $:/courses-category-economics $:/courses-category-law $:/courses-category-curriculum-or-pedagogy $:/courses-category-literature-and-culture $:/courses-category-history $:/courses-category-science $:/courses-category-engineering $:/courses-category-agriculture-forestry-and-gardening $:/courses-category-medicine-and-health-care $:/courses-category-art-and-design $:/courses-category-others $:/courses-newcategory $:/courses-managetabs"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/DefaultView":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/DefaultView","text":"table"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/ReadingMode":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/ReadingMode","text":"off"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/TableFields":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/TableFields","text":"tbl-expand title description importance"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category/preset":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category/preset","text":"Planning Ongoing Completed IT [[Languages and cultures]] Management Philosophy Economics Law [[Curriculum or pedagogy]] [[Literature and culture]] History Science Engineering [[Agriculture, forestry and gardening]] [[Medicine and health care]] [[Art and design]] Others"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab","text":"$:/listing-courses-all"},"$:/config/new-course/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-course/Tags","text":"Course Planning"},"$:/config/new-course/Text":{"title":"$:/config/new-course/Text","text":"!! 课程目录 @@.list-tree @@"},"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption":{"title":"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Caption"},"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag":{"title":"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Ctag"},"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Tags","text":"$:/tags/CourseCategories"},"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title":{"title":"$:/config/new-coursecategory/Title","text":"$:/courses-category-"},"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/courses":{"title":"$:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/courses","text":"COURSES"},"$:/courses-aggregation-view":{"title":"$:/courses-aggregation-view","caption":"聚合视图","text":"\import $:/courses-macros <$macrocall $name="aggregation-with-tag" state="aggregation-courses" class="" cardTemplate="$:/courses-card-template" searchClass="xp-search-courses" promptTiddler="$:/courses-prompt" />"},"$:/courses-card-template":{"title":"$:/courses-card-template","text":"<$macrocall $name="thumbnail" link={{!!link}} icon={{!!icon}} color={{!!color}} background-color={{!!background-color}} image={{!!image}} caption={{!!caption}} width="220" height="123"/>"},"$:/courses-category-view":{"title":"$:/courses-category-view","caption":"分类视图","text":"\import $:/courses-macros <$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/> """> <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList=<> default={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category-view/DefaultTab}} class="tc-vertical" /> "},"$:/courses-help":{"title":"$:/courses-help","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/help","text":"
COURSES 是视频课程的索引界面。使用方法与 BOOKSHELF 基本一致，请参阅 [[Bookshelf Help|$:/bookshelf-help]]。
该主题预设分类标签以 [[Title List|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Title%2520List.html]] 的形式存储于： <> 其他说明： * 分类使用「[[学堂在线|https://www.xuetangx.com/search?query=&channel=navigation_bar]]」的学科分类； * 课程封面图（宽高比 220:123 px），不支持 SVG。建议标题使用小写和下划线。为了管理，添加标签 <>。"},"$:/courses-macros":{"title":"$:/courses-macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro/Aggregation","text":"\define aggregationTag() Course \define systemCTag() $:/tags/CourseCategories \define uiTitle() $:/config/xp/aggregation/ui/courses \define categoryPrefix() $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/category/ \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-courses/Tabs/Visibility/ 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/courses-prompt":{"title":"$:/courses-prompt","text":"
{{$:/xp/images/course}}
New course will appear here
"},"$:/courses-tidgraph-view":{"title":"$:/courses-tidgraph-view","caption":"进度列表","text":"\import $:/courses-macros \define aggrFilter() [tag[$(aggregationTag)$]!has[draft.of]sort[]] <$list filter="[tag!has[draft.of]count[]!match[0]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[tagtag[Planning]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$tidgraph start="Planning" filter=<> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/> <$list filter="[tagtag[Ongoing]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$tidgraph start="Ongoing" filter=<> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/> <$list filter="[tagtag[Completed]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$tidgraph start="Completed" filter=<> nodetemplate="IconTemplate" maxdepth="1"/> "},"$:/xp/images/course":{"title":"$:/xp/images/course","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/xp/images/courses":{"title":"$:/xp/images/courses","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/heiban.png":{"title":"$:/heiban.png","text":"","type":"image/png","tags":"$:/tags/Image"}}}
